sentences.en: A few twentieths of a gram can be critical.
sentences.cn: 即使重量仅有1克的二十分之几都可能是关键性的。

sentences.en: Foreign trade is of critical importance to the economy.
sentences.cn: 外贸对经济而言非常重要。

sentences.en: He has apologised for critical remarks he made about the referee.
sentences.cn: 他为自己对裁判的出言不逊道了歉。

sentences.en: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.cn: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

sentences.en: He remained in a critical condition after suffering heart failure.
sentences.cn: 他发生心力衰竭后病情一直危重。

sentences.en: He remains in a critical condition in a California hospital.
sentences.cn: 他在加州的一家医院里，病情仍然十分危急。

sentences.en: He was critical of the people, disparaging of their crude manners.
sentences.cn: 他对那些人很有看法，看不起他们粗俗的举止。

sentences.en: He was in a critical condition, fighting for his life in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他的情况很危急，正在医院里与死神搏斗。

sentences.en: I am very critical of the adequacy of Britain's race laws.
sentences.cn: 我对英国种族法律的适当性颇有微词。

sentences.en: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

sentences.en: If someone says something critical I take it to heart.
sentences.cn: 如果有人提出批评，我会十分介意。

sentences.en: It is absolutely critical for us to know the truth.
sentences.cn: 我们知道真相是极其重要的。

sentences.en: Marx's work was more than a critical study of capitalist production.
sentences.cn: 马克思的著作不仅仅是对资本主义生产的批判性研究。

sentences.en: Ten of the injured are said to be in critical condition.
sentences.cn: 据说伤者中有10人情况危急。

sentences.en: The boy's condition has been downgraded from critical to serious.
sentences.cn: 男孩已脱离生命危险，但病情仍很严重。

sentences.en: The film met with considerable critical and public acclaim.
sentences.cn: 该影片受到了影评人和公众的高度评价。

sentences.en: The German authorities are considering an airlift if the situation becomes critical.
sentences.cn: 如果局势变得危急，德国当局将考虑实施空运。

sentences.en: When I produced this piece of work, my lecturers were very critical.
sentences.cn: 当我拿出这件作品时，我的讲师们提出了诸多批评意见。

sentences.en: Your decision is critical to our future.
sentences.cn: 你的决定对我们的将来至关重要。

words.tran_cn: 精密地；危急地；批评性地；用钻研眼光地
批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

phrases.tran_cn: 关键时刻；临界力矩，临界时限
挑剔；对……感到不满，对……表示谴责
批判性思维，批判性的思考；批判思考能力，判断思维

trans.tran_cn: 关键的，(病情或局势)严重的，批评的，评论家的，评判性的
trans.tran_en: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something
